ptII/vendors/boehm/README.txt
$Id: PTII_README.txt 26836 2003-04-05 02:31:00Z cxh $

This directory contains class files for the CaffeineMark benchmark
which is used by the C code generator in copernicus/c

The main page for the CaffeineMark is
http://www-sor.inria.fr/~java/tools/cmkit

The source code itself came from
http://www-sor.inria.fr/~java/tools/cmkit/embed.zip

To install, do
 
cd $PTII/vendors/cm
# Download
http://www-sor.inria.fr/~java/tools/cmkit/embed.zip
jar -xf embed.zip
